languages.text: At the start of its turn, this ship suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.

languages.text: В начале своего хода корабль получает {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный 25% от его максимальной {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостности корпуса{/g}.
Zu Beginn seines Zuges erleidet dieses Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 25 % seines maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfes{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} nimmt dieses Schiff Schaden in Höhe von 25% seines maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfes{/g}.

languages.text: Au début de son tour, ce vaisseau subit des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} représentant 25 % de son nombre maximum de points de {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of its turn, this ship suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, ce vaisseau subit des dégâts représentant 25 % de son nombre maximum de points de {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g}.

languages.text: 回合开始时，这艘战舰会承受{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于舰体最大耐久的25%。
languages.original_text: At the start of its turn, this ship suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，这艘战舰会承受舰体损害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}最大耐久的25%。

languages.text: Al principio de su turno, esta nave recibe {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual al 25 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} máximo.
languages.original_text: At the start of its turn, this ship suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta nave recibe daño igual al 25 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} máximo.

languages.text: ターン開始時、この船は最大{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}値の25%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: At the start of its turn, this ship suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 25% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、この船は最大{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}値の25%に等しいダメージを受ける。

languages.text: Bu gemi, turunun başında maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}gövde{/g} değerinin %25'i kadar {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
